pullrequest.title: Fix up pkg-config and cmake files when falling back to ignition-math3.

content.raw: Hmpf.  The two CI failures are on Windows and OSX.  The Windows one shouldn't have anything to do with this PR; it is complaining that `tolower is not a member of std`.  The OSX one failed to create the destination directory, which seems like a CI failure, not code failure.  Let me know if I can do anything to help fix those.
content.html: Hmpf. The two CI failures are on Windows and OSX. The Windows one shouldn't have anything to do with this PR; it is complaining that tolower is not a member of std. The OSX one failed to create the destination directory, which seems like a CI failure, not code failure. Let me know if I can do anything to help fix those.
